article.title: QinetiQ North America Receives $225 Million NASA Subcontract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: QinetiQ North America's Mission Solutions Group has been awarded a subcontract by Abacus Technology Corporation to support information management and communications activities for the National Aeronautical and Space Administration's Kennedy Space Center. The contract, which will run up to nine years, has a potential value of $225 million. QinetiQ North America will provide systems engineering, sustaining engineering, and imaging and timing services to Abacus Technology as a subcontractor.
